org.openpnp.spi

Enum Driver.MotionControlType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Driver.MotionControlType>
      • org.openpnp.spi.Driver.MotionControlType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Driver.MotionControlType>
    Enclosing interface:
    Driver

    public static enum Driver.MotionControlType
extends java.lang.Enum<Driver.MotionControlType>
    The MotionControlType determines how the OpenPnP MotionPlanner will do its planning and how it will talk to the controller.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ConstantAcceleration
      Apply motion planning assuming a controller with constant acceleration motion control.
      EuclideanAxisLimits
      Apply axis feed-rate, acceleration and jerk limits multiplied by the proper speed factors.
      Full3rdOrderControl
      Apply motion planning assuming a controller with full 3rd order motion control.
      ModeratedConstantAcceleration
      Apply motion planning assuming a controller constant acceleration motion control but moderate the acceleration and velocity to resemble those of 3rd order control, resulting in a move that takes the same amount of time.
      SimpleSCurve
      Apply motion planning assuming a controller with simplified S-Curve motion control.
      Simulated3rdOrderControl
      Apply motion planning assuming a controller constant acceleration motion control but simulating 3rd order control with time step interpolation.
      ToolpathFeedRate
      Apply the nominal driver feed-rate limit multiplied by the speed factor to the tool-path.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ToolpathFeedRate

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType ToolpathFeedRate
        Apply the nominal driver feed-rate limit multiplied by the speed factor to the tool-path. The driver feed-rate must be specified. No acceleration control is applied.

      • EuclideanAxisLimits

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType EuclideanAxisLimits
        Apply axis feed-rate, acceleration and jerk limits multiplied by the proper speed factors. The Euclidean Metric is calculated to allow the machine to run faster in a diagonal. All profile motion control is left to the controller.

      • ConstantAcceleration

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType ConstantAcceleration
        Apply motion planning assuming a controller with constant acceleration motion control.

      • ModeratedConstantAcceleration

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType ModeratedConstantAcceleration
        Apply motion planning assuming a controller constant acceleration motion control but moderate the acceleration and velocity to resemble those of 3rd order control, resulting in a move that takes the same amount of time.

      • SimpleSCurve

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType SimpleSCurve
        Apply motion planning assuming a controller with simplified S-Curve motion control. Simplified S-Curves have no constant acceleration phase, only jerk phases (e.g. TinyG, Marlin).

      • Simulated3rdOrderControl

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType Simulated3rdOrderControl
        Apply motion planning assuming a controller constant acceleration motion control but simulating 3rd order control with time step interpolation.

      • Full3rdOrderControl

        public static final Driver.MotionControlType Full3rdOrderControl
        Apply motion planning assuming a controller with full 3rd order motion control.
